# [Interview #663: Melbourne Writers' Festival - Ali Kayn, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=663#5)

#### Question

Do you have a favourite author or book (or writer or film or series) that has influenced you or that you return to?

#### Robert Jordan

Charles Dickens, John D. MacDonald, Louis L'Amour and Mark Twain.

I've learned different things from different ones.
